unnormalised: Arre bhai, market toh aaj gir gaya! Tata Motors down by 2%, Reliance almost at ₹2750. Should I hold or sell? Thinking of investing in HDFC Bank, heard they're giving good returns, like 7.5% p.a. Also, what’s the deal with this new IPO? Heard it's oversubscribed 10x already. Any advice from seasoned investors here?
normalised: Arre bhai, market toh aaj gir gaya! Tata Motors down by two percent, Reliance almost at rupee two thousand seven hundred and fifty. Should I hold or sell? Thinking of investing in H-D-F-C Bank, heard they're giving good returns, like seven point five percent p.a. Also, what's the deal with this new I-P-O? Heard it's oversubscribed ten times already. Any advice from seasoned investors here?
